title: Interpret IRS Math Error Notice
description: A taxpayer receives a notice from the IRS (e.g., CP11) indicating a math error was found on their return.

tasks.description: Review the IRS notice to identify the specific line item that was corrected.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the IRS corrected a simple addition error in calculating total income.

tasks.description: Review the original tax return to confirm the math error.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies that the math error did occur as the IRS stated.

tasks.description: Advise the taxpayer to pay the additional tax due, as the correction is accurate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear advice to the taxpayer on how to resolve the issue.
